issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Strong supporter of protecting and expanding the Affordable Care Act, with focus on protecting pre-existing condition coverage

issues.title: Maternal Health
issues.description: Proposed legislation to address Black maternal mortality crisis, focusing on reducing racial disparities in healthcare outcomes

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports Green New Deal framework, advocates for clean energy transition and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Affordable Housing
issues.description: Supports increased federal funding for affordable housing programs and tenant protection initiatives

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice advocate, supports federal protection of abortion access and women's reproductive healthcare

issues.title: Gun Violence Prevention
issues.description: Supports comprehensive background checks and assault weapons restrictions

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with pathway to citizenship and protection for DACA recipients

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded access to higher education
